did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Pleasant Richards Bill of Sale, 6 August 1825

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Pleasant Richards Bill of Sale, 6 August 1825. Accession 24846. Personal papers collection. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Mrs. Walter W. Anderson, Jetersville, Virginia, 18 September 1958.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Pleasant Richards died in Amelia County by 25 February 1836. His wife was named Sally and he had at least one brother and one sister according to his will. The will does not mention any children.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Bill of sale, 6 August 1825, for a female slave named Fanny and her "increase" from Jarrett A. Jeter (1800-1866) to Pleasant Richards (d. 1837), both of Amelia County, Virginia.
